scripts.dev-2: . ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use v11 && npm install && forever stopall && NODE_ENV=development forever start -l forever.log -t -o out.log -e err.log -a --minUptime 5000 --spinSleepTime 2000 -c "node" app.js
scripts.prod: forever stopall && NODE_ENV=production forever start -l forever.log -t -o out.log -e err.log -a --minUptime 5000 --spinSleepTime 2000 -c "node" app.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && find public/blog -type f -delete && find public/event -type f -delete && find public/user -type f -delete && find public/temp -type f -delete && find public/page -type f -delete
